sense.def:
To survive
pomeni živeti ali obstajati naprej kljub veliki nevarnosti ali težavam.

seg.quote: Four of his brothers died: the fifth survived.
Very few people survived the immediate effects of the explosion.

sense.def:
To survive someone
pomeni živeti tudi še potem, ko nekdo drug umre.

seg.quote: She will probably survive me by many years.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
survives
, obstaja še naprej.

seg.quote: I doubt whether the National Health Service will survive to the end of the century.
The project survived three changes of government.

sense.def:
To survive a difficult experience
pomeni, da nam uspe prebroditi težavno izkušnjo in ne dovoliti, da bi močneje vplivala na nas.

seg.quote: She survived the divorce pretty well.
You have to make difficult decisions to survive in business.
